collectible.title: A Sexy Picture Of A Guitar
collectible.subtitle: Oh, and Ibuki's there too.
collectible.text: A picture of Ibuki with her guitar, a Dean Flying V. She saved up for quite a while to buy it. There were cheaper guitars available, but she really wanted a Flying V and Dean was the only maker she could find that builds them for left-handed guitarists.
collectible.unlock: Win a match against Critical Darling
